newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: Yields inch down on 182-day Lithuanian T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Yields inch down on 182-day Lithuanian T-bills.

text.p: Yields fell on 182-day Lithuanian Treasury bills at Tuesday's auction despite the fact that the 50 million litas issue was undersubscribed, the central bank said.
The average yield was 9.83 percent, down from the 9.89 percent offered at the last auction for 182-day paper on May 6.
The settlement date is May 16 and the bills mature on November 14.
All figures in millions of litas unless otherwise indicated.
